scripts.get:dapr: dapr run --app-id cns-dapr-get --resources-path ../cns-dapr/components -- npm run get
scripts.post:dapr: dapr run --app-id cns-dapr-post --resources-path ../cns-dapr/components -- npm run post
scripts.publish:dapr: dapr run --app-id cns-dapr-publish --resources-path ../cns-dapr/components -- npm run publish
scripts.subscribe:dapr: dapr run --app-id cns-dapr-subscribe --app-port 3100 --app-protocol http --resources-path ../cns-dapr/components -- npm run subscribe
